author: Anna Hirtenstein
title: Italian Bond Yields Rise as Europe Signals Lack of Cohesion - The Wall Street Journal
description: Questions arise about the eurozone’s willingness to support Italy as finance ministers fail to agree on a response
content: The yield on benchmark 10-year debt jumped above 1.7% on Wednesday from around 1.5% the day before. The spread between this bond and Europes safest asset, German government debt, widened to more than 2 percentage points, having been as narrow as 1.6 points on… [+2890 chars]
